sentences.en: Baffle — a device used to deflect material flow in a desired direction.
sentences.cn: 挡板—是一种改变物质到设定方向的一种装置.

sentences.en: Cage changed his name to deflect accusations of nepotism.
sentences.cn: 凯奇改了名字以避免别人指责他搞裙带关系。

sentences.en: Deflect Arrows: now ends only when you successfully hit with an attack.
sentences.cn: 弓箭闪避态势: 现在技能在当你攻击成功时才会结束.

sentences.en: He deflected the blow with his forearm.
sentences.cn: 他用前臂挡开了打来的一拳。

sentences.en: Howerer, under heavy load the shaft may deflect excessively.
sentences.cn: 但是, 在重载作用下,轴会发生过度挠曲.

sentences.en: It also helps deflect the air flow through the down - draft cooling system.
sentences.cn: 它也有助于改变下送风冷却系统的空气流动方向.

sentences.en: Never let a little problem deflect you.
sentences.cn: 决不要因一点小问题就半途而废。

sentences.en: The ball deflected off Reid's body into the goal.
sentences.cn: 球打在里德身上反弹进球门。

sentences.en: The blast may deflect structural steel frames, collapse roofs, dish - in walls, shatter panels, and break windows.
sentences.cn: 爆震可能使结构物的钢架变形, 屋顶倒塌墙壁内陷, 墙板破碎, 窗户玻璃破碎等.

sentences.en: The corresponding electric currents are used to deflect an electron beam in a cathodiray tube.
sentences.cn: 相应的电流就用来使阴极射线管里的电子束偏转.

sentences.en: The experts are trying to deflect the stream from its original course.
sentences.cn: 专家们正设法使这条河流改道.

sentences.en: This special metal shield will deflect a bullet from its course.
sentences.cn: 这种特殊的金属盾将使子弹改变方向.

sentences.en: To cause to swerve from a straight line; deflect.
sentences.cn: 使转弯;转向使从直线弯曲; 转向.

sentences.en: To deflect or ward off ( a fencing thrust, for example ).
sentences.cn: 避开或挡开 ( 如击剑中的袭击 )

sentences.en: We wanted to deflect any unwanted attention away from ourselves.
sentences.cn: 我们想避免引起任何不必要的注意.

sentences.en: What situation makes the galvanometer deflect the most?
sentences.cn: 什么情况下它偏转的角度最大?

sentences.en: You deflect compliments in the presence of foreign friends.
sentences.cn: 外国朋友在场时,会把别人的赞美推掉.

words.tran_cn: 导向装置；偏针仪，导流板

trans.tran_en: to change direction or make sth change direction, especially after hitting sth

trans.tran_cn: 使歪斜，使弯曲，偏转，偏离
